comments.message: Dear McDonalds, if u would like to create a veggie burger, pls take into consideration this: There are vegans and vegetarians. Pls be clear whether your burger is vegan or vegetarian. If vegetarian, chinese veg or indian veg. Chinese veg usually can vary in egg consumption, cannot eat garlic onion. Indian veg usually can eat garlic onion. Your sauce is mc chicken sauce, we don't know if that sauce is vegan friendly or vegetarian friendly and to me the name suggest that there is chicken in that sauce. It is not clear. Over all the info is not clear. Pls carify my doubts so fellow friends know exactly if it suits them. Because for us, some vegetarians practice due to religion or compassion for animals. Any wrong intake can result in serious guilt and going against moral values. Doing business is one thing but being understanding towards a certain type of diet such as veg diet, has to be precise. Thank you. :)

Can you please come up with a pure vegetarian burger that does not contain garlic, onions and eggs please? There are real strict vegetarians that cannot consume the above and hence, they are only be able to enjoy the fries and drinks while the rest of the friends get to eat the full meal. Thanks!
Please keep this on the menu, there will be many vegetarians who would appreciate it.
Keep it as a permanent menu.
It is awesome. Please retain this. This is the first time you have come with a vegetarian burger.
Is it going to there on menu permanently
Appreciate the veggie burger addition but why put the Mcchicken sauce? Isn't that misleading to vegetarians?
Wow. Would you advise wat are put into this yummy burger? As there are different type of vegetarian
Hi Mcdonald,  is it pure vegetarian?  What are the ingredients?  Is it fried separately in vegetable oil?  Please advise
since there's egg in the sauce I still can't eat cos I am a strict vegan with Buddhist background -- no garlic for me too....
Hi McDonald's, is there seasoning in the veggie patty? If yes, does it contain onion or garlic? Thanks in advance for your reply on this
Hi but I read in the description that there is a ting of McChicken sauce...is it true...is yes then how is it a veggie burger?
With egg or without egg? We were told that even veggie patti has egg within it ? But the information only tells about the chicken sauce...why can't u make veggie burger completely veggie? McDonald's?
Hi @McDonald's May we know if the bread ingredient include eggs? would love to try it if it doesnt. :)
Is this a permanent burger choice on the menu?
Thank You so much McDonalds for this huge consideration for pure vegetarians like us 😊😊feels like an entire demograph is being recognized 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻
Though it's a still a good option for vegetarians to have this burger with no sauce ....however to actually make it veg there should be a veg sauce too instead of mc chicken sauce ....

I would rather you hold the sauce and serve dry with the sauces separate. It's too wet and makes it difficult to hold on to the whole burger without the contents sliding out and sauce dripping all over your hands and table. If you have to add the sauce in, please wrap the burger in wax paper. It's just too messy to eat as is.
Hi there, I am asking whether the veggie patty has seasonings in it and if there is onion or garlic? Kindly give a direct reply to my question. Please do not give the usual standard reply.
This burger minus the sauce is not a balanced meal. You need to add in vegetable protein. You can use bean or nut flours to add to your potato patty to firm it up for example.

hi, i saw advertisment showing the value set going at S$5, which include the burger, 1 side and a drink. May i know when the promotion is till and does it applies during dinner time? Or just lunch hours?
Thank you! I've been eating for this the past few days now and it tastes good. Tastes like a mcchicken!
Wait! Is this a vegetarian burger?! 😍 Finally I have things to eat at macdonalds except for fries /pies /ice cream 😜 Jiahui Yeo Tse Lay
Only the carrot knows the impending horror that will befall them all

My hubby is vegetarian n so sad mcdonalds don't have any vegetarian Burger,  he only can see me n children enjoy ourselves. Hope mac will have something new for vegetarian people at least we can enjoy together at a same.place to enjoy.food =)

0.post_text: What’s full of all these yummy ingredients, and even bigger on flavour? Yes, this long-awaited burger has finally arrived… and it’s going to be crunchy!

comments.message: Apology accepted only if you bring back banana pie
Will deeply missed the good services and food.

1.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0300 hours to 0400 hours on 29 Aug 2016. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24hrs restaurants during this time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

comments.message: Hi, just want to know when this promotion ends?
Spent 60cts more for more gucamole sauce for my spicy tortillas burger yet this seems no difference than normal burger. Felt cheated for my money.
Yr price very atas too
Burgers would be better with .. Banana Pie

Macdonald's should indicate clearly which is spicy.. thinking that the cheese Angus burger was non spicy, I ordered it. while. waiting for my order, an Ang moh went to the counter with an Atas box and could hear him say, 'i didnt know this was spicy, I can't take spicy'..I had a feeling it was the same burger I ordered and true enough it was..my son couldn't eat it and I have bad gastric but didnt want to waste the $ so wolfed it down, and took my son elsewhere to eat.. definitely very disappointing with Macdonald's
This Spicy Chicken & Apple Slaw burger is a healthy burger.

I'd like to differ. McD's Signature Apple Slaw Spicy Chicken Burger really worth trying. Thought apple would make the fried patty soggy by the time it gets to my door but I was so wrong. Both the apple and chicken patty are equally crispy as if they almost came straight from the kitchen! They even surprised me by replacing lettuce with rockets! Well done, McDonald's Singapore . Well done! 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻😋😋
So... normal burgers are made with non premium ingredients. Glad to know that.
So I ordered a burger with extra patty and got no patty instead? Mcd you might want to check out how people's park outlet is being run. Stop giving false expectations and disappointments.

McDonald's McDelivery at 11:53PM, ordered reached at 1:39AM. Not so fussy about the time, but when the fries arrived they were so soggy like they've been cooked and left for hours. Also, 1 packet of chilli sauce for 20pc McNuggets?

The cheese one tasted exactly like double cheese burger and the volume of the burger wasnt as much as advertised. Pretty disappointing id rather buy 5 mac doubles. Not sure if it happens only at this outlet or what
The sour cream dip is not sour cream at all, it is sour cream flavour. It was not very tasty.
The classic cheese not bad but didn't indicate that its spicy.
Loved the  apple slaw burger from Rivervale Mall.. the sauce makes it extra spicy. The apple strips gives extra crunch to the burger.the amount of apple slaw and vege was generous. Did not regret.

So pissed off with the quantity of the dressings in "Atas" burgers (the apple slaw was too little, like feeding my rabbit?) compared to the true atas customized burgers sold previously. But I guess you needed to figure out a way to clear the inventory due to the lack of demand for the old (and much nicer) custom burgers.
Worst copy ever 😂😂😂
I liked the cheese one but the apple slaw one was terrible it was just like a mcspicy and the appleslaw made me feel like i wanted to vomit but the rest were nice
It doesnt even look like the advertised pictures. In real life the vege is like half dead or something.
what has 3000 castles got to do with their breed of cows >.>
Really disappointed with the Angus burger as the meat wasn't any different from the normal cheese burger. Way overpriced. Not worth the money at all.
Frankly, this "collection" of burgers isn't really your finest work.
Eat eat eat
Apple slaw burger would be nicer if you used the samurai burger patty and cooked the apple like you do in apple pies (JUST AN OPINION)
Singapore Mac Donald is doing this purposely to be better.
Why no more create your own burger

comments.message:
Hi I had food poisoning after eating your burger at tampines mcdonald opposite the interchange. I dint eat anything else except the burger in the morning at 7:35 am After eating around 9am I vomitted and had stomach pains and cramps then high fever and loss of appitite at night. 

I can be sure its your burger causing it as I did not eat anything else before that
I'm so sad that we can't create your own taste. Why mcd why!!!!!!!
Hi, the Bukit Panjang Outlet only gave me half a piece of cheese for the fillet o fish burger. What happened to that full piece of cheese and your consistency in your quality? You can't afford to?

hi, I would to bring out a point that NOT ALL 24 hours outlet are open. I visited River Vale Plaza and Sengkang swimming complex both 24 hours McDonald's and both are closed for maintenence from 11pm to 7am

what's worst is that the notice a River Vale plaza outlet advise patrons to visit sengkang swimming complex outlet without checking if it is open or close. 

There is no clear stating of the outlets that are open and you simply assumed ALL 24 hours outlets are open during your website maintanace. 

I made empty trips to both outlet without getting my McDonald's meal because you simply assumed all outlets are open and operating. you couldn't be bothered to look into each individual stores and fact check on their operating hours before directing people to these outlets. 

I'm utterly disappointed with the way you put out the public announcement.

hi i would like to bring up that there a problem ordering at your delivery site. everytime when i have i entered the the 4 digit pin, it always gives me to an error page stating unable to process my order with reasons given such as, You have exceeded the time limit for submission of information.
Multiple browser windows are open
You have pressed the back button on the browser by mistake.
The bookmarked page you're viewing has expired.

A posting in facebook showa there are live worms in your product
Please verify and take neccessary action!
Always getting this error lately. What's up?

unique putin erdogan trump merkel cameron george carlin obama action figures. worth to see
http://www.fabrikasuvenirov.com/
Apologies accepted only if you bring back.. Banana Pie

Hi Mcdonald, it seem like either your feedback site is down or you are choosing not to reply to any feedbacks or complains. Your delivery on a non peak weekday need 1hr 20mins and on top of that you need another 10mins. This really does not make senses at all. Hope you would decide to answer to your facebook post at least.
Hi, you may want to relook at your 24/7  description written on your profile. You are not open 24/7 for this outlet am i right? Stating opening hours on your profile will help us customers very much.

Mcdelivery always come late on top of long delivery time of 40-60 mins and a minimum spend and delivery charge. The last time was 10 mins  late with no grape jam for the big breakfast and today 20 mins late. Seriously not loving it
You have ruined everything in my life, MacDonald.
Hi McDonalds, Can we request to have Pokemon happy meal please?

Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24hrs restaurants during this time. comments.message: The classic cheese sucks! The cheese is almost green! No cheesy taste at all! Meat was dry too! Double cheeseburger def does a better job!

McDonald's staff attitude sucks. Coffee was  bland at lido shaw tower and other branches. Had to feedback to them and redone not once but too many times . At lucky plaza or sun plaza was also bad service and mc Donalds manager couldn't be bothered with the feedback of  staff. Can't even get it right to brew a coffee? Simple job. And mc Donalds ice cream  seemed soft temperature not right

Please be clear in naming your burgers. Out of the 3, I bought the Classic Cheese assuming that it is not spicy but felt cheated after taking a mouthful. I feel that the collection should offer non-spicy burgers too because not all Atas people can take spicy food.

Ask my brother to help me buy MC Donald's...
Too busy and haven't had any food...
Supposed to eat vegetarian today...
But bo bian ... Ask him buy a burger to eat.. or else eat veg only. No strength....
End up... I eat the burger.... The meat taste funny...
End up I see...... Wah kao.. sala leh !!!...
It is beef lor! Wtf.... Beef n chicken... How to mix up...
And Buddhist cannot take beef...
How can make such a mistake..... Wah kao eh.

Hi Mcdonalds, does the Classic Cheese with Angus Beef have chilli inside? I ordered it and it was quite spicy. Is there chilli as a sauce by default? It wasn't specified anywhere. Was quite upset because i was looking forward to it but i don't take spice so much of the burger was downed with coke. Disappointment.

Went to get the tortilla one for dinner after being out all day on weekend. Usually check my take away as McDonalds always stuffs it up, but pleasantly surprised to see all items there.
Get home and open my burger; no tortilla chips and none of the salsa either, just meat, cheese and lettuce. Got me again McDonalds!!!
Where is the "be atas" wouldn't it be phrase that way? "can atas" seems odd.. Advertising went wrong? Dj celebrities have already make singlish sounds reputabably singlish..

At the end of a long day working, before reaching home, I decided to stop by the nearest McDonald's at Bishan Junction 8, ready to end the day strong with one of McDonald's Signature burgers, the Classic Angus Beef.

I waited in the line finally reaching the front, made a simple request with my order to remove the vegetables, explicitly saying No Onions, No Tomatoes, and my request was ignored when I got the burger, the tomato was removed granted, but the onions were left there.

This is all fine, up till this point so a mistake was made, now it needs to be rectified. As far as I'm concerned I didn't know once the burger has passed the counter, it could be brought back to the kitchen to be fixed? Says a lot about the hygiene standards of The Golden Arches.

Anyway, this McDonald's employee stuttered and looked at me "oh, you asked for no onions ah?" I said yes, in which she asked her manager what she should do and the manager responded saying "take it back and remove the onions" so she took back the burger and they removed the onions along with the cheese and sauce, and at this point it has been over 20 minutes of waiting in the line followed by another 10 waiting for my burger and ANOTHER ADDITIONAL 5 minutes waiting for them to get my order "RIGHT", at the very end when they got my order wrong the second time, I took what I had which was an underwhelming burger and I called it quits, extremely disappointed.

Given up on the McDonald's employee and the manager, it's very frustrating at the end of an extremely long day I come to McDonald to get my dinner at 11:30pm and they provide such "Quality Service", looking forward to many more eventful trips like these, thanks McDonald's.
Worth every cents. Simply delicious. Enjoyed every bit of it. But didn't expect it to be spicy. Luckily I can take the spiciness. Thumbs up.

Ordered Classic Cheese burger, requested for only 1 slice of cheese and end up no cheese..seriously its stated in the order form for delivery and cant your guys just get a simple order right, paying delivery charge is fine, u guys are charging higher amounts compared to the store and such issue still happen. please get this fix..

I tried the mcspicy with apple slaw burger with my mom. It was OK but my mom didn't seem very impressed with it. I like the apple slaw by itself, maybe you could keep that on the menu as a side dish instead of combining with a burger?

Thick juicy meat patties with REAL BACON, not turkey jerky. THATS A GREAT BURGER. SO PLEASE..... STFU..
No real bacon, pathetic "burgers", etc... I'd go for Carl's Junior anytime if I want a quick meal...
Recently, you guys came up with create a burger, so I created one as close to a Carl's Junior. 
I don't really know what to say but the price is almost the same, but you don't even come close to Carl's Junior 's junior's junior.....  
Guess you guys been clowning around all these years....
Even Ramli burgers beat you hands down...

I am a fan of the build your own burgers, and I must say that the signature collection is really disappointing. The classic cheese was unpleasantly spicy, burger was wet and soggy. It was really disappointing compared to the previous menu, where I was allowed to choose what I put inside. I think this collection is a step backwards...
Can we have some decent burger:two pcs bread with chicken or beef,tomatoes wif cabbage or cheese plus topping of teriyaki sauce...n warm fries or wedges...at rate of $6.50...thanks

the spicy sause is not chilli spiciness but is chemical acid, did mc.d ever think of consumer's health ?  

if someone stomach got sick due to chemical acid, will they still love mc.d?
Spicy Chicken with Apple Slaw! I'm a fan of this, even though it's a little pricey ($7 just for the burger). Great job! Thanks for coming up with a new burger that's not beef!

I think the best burger is still the McSpicy or CNY prosperity. Some promos are abit too weird in taste. Visually appealing on paper but reality shows otherwise. Last promo burger, salted egg yolk thingie, the dried curry leaf (maybe, not sure) overwhelms the taste of everything. This time, the new promo burgers are better, but please remind the customers of the hidden spice in the angus beef burger. Personally spice is fine for me but not every Singaporeans can stomach it. :/

Now, everyone can BE atas...
not everyone can atas...
can atas what?? pls check the word 1st before using...i think alot has pointed it out..yet there is still no changes made yet...

I tried all 3 burgers from the Signature collection and they are all spicy. The spicy chicken is the  hottest of all. Both the sauce and the chicken are spicy and my mouth was numb after a few bites. Even the classic cheese with angus beef is spicy despite the absence of the word "spicy" in the name, thanks to the sauce. 

I can handle spicy food but I was caught off guard by the spice level so I pity those who can't handle spicy food. McD should either offer a non-spicy item in the Signature Collection or add a chilli label to inform customers of the spice level. (Alternatively, a customer can ask for less or no sauce if he/she cannot handle the spice)
Wahahaa I STOP eating at Mc's since they shrunk there burgers. If you had eaten the REAL deal when they open at Liat Tower. You'll know what I mean.

Pleasantly surprised with the quality of the Classic Cheese burger but like other commenters would have preferred a Spicy warning (my husband doesn't take spice!) overall, though, burger was very tasty and juicy. Hope the quality stays the same across all outlets! (FYI ordered ours at the White Sands McDonalds)

I was so hungry and decided to order the 1 with the tortilla chips. Surprisingly came with fresh veggies and the chips were still crispy. Damn shiok lor! another 1 I'll look forward to aside from the rendang burger which I really really miss. 👏🏼👏🏼
I had classic cheese last weekend at McD at AMK ave 10. The bun came dark brown. Nothing like what was in the ad. Please bring back create ur own burger. At least that looks good.
The classic cheese angus beef burger is such a disappointment. Threw 1/2 the burger away.
Not nice at all. Tried the spicy tortilla, the beef patty was dry and the entire burger had no flavour.

4.post_text:
Now, everyone can atas with our new Signature Collection offerings! Savour our Spicy Chicken with Apple Slaw, Classic Cheese with Angus Beef and Spicy Tortilla with Angus Beef. To top it off, complete your meal with our Potato Wedges with Sour Cream Dip and Red Velvet McFlurry® with Oreo® Cookies! 

Find out more at https://goo.gl/vkFQFr.

Dear Customers, thank you for joining us in celebrating our hero and golden boy, Joseph Schooling! Our FREE Chicken McNuggets® (6pc) have been fully redeemed in all our restaurants (excluding iFly, RWS, LIDO, Gardens by The Bay and institutional stores). 

Once again, we congratulate Joseph Schooling on winning his own golden nugget at the Rio Olympics! 

#goldenboy #goldennugget #Rio2016

Instead of giving to those that don't really need it, why not donate to those who really need it. That will be more meaningful, wouldn't it?
Only 50?! That really cheapens his achievements, might as well don't do it at all!
Stop complaining la these people, got free things also wanna complain, so self-entitled oml. U not happy then don't participate, as simple as that.

If u are only giving to first 50 customers then forget it, dun waste people's time.
Why dun u give filet o fish? Fish swims...joseph swims also...how come equate swimming with chicken nuggets leh?
rather you donate it to children's homes eg grace haven

大家都不要这样好不好People Giving You Free Food You Guys Should Thank Them Not Bloody Complaining Here & There Waked Up All Your Mind You Guys Think That You Are 6 Yrs Old Or 3 Yrs Old Fighting/Quarrelling & Arguing Because Of This Small Matter
1st 50 person only?? For the whole day la... after work then only can come le.

Please inform ALL the staff in ALL your participating franchise outlets of such promotion. 
My parents tried to claim the 6pc nugget from your Geylang East outlet but was told there is no such promotion.
Only 1st 50? Sad ...y not make it 1 day promo... 😑
Want to give then be generous.. 50 boxes .. Please don't give .. Waste time .. See you no up

6.post_text:
HISTORY HAS BEEN MADE! 

To celebrate our hero and golden boy Joseph Schooling, on winning his own golden nugget at Rio, we'll be giving out FREE Chicken McNuggets® (6pc)* to the first 50 customers at all McDonald's Restaurants (excluding iFly, RWS, LIDO, Gardens by The Bay and institutional stores) on Monday, 15 August 2016, 11am onwards.

Majulah Singapura!

#goldenboy #goldennugget #rio2016

*Simply flash this message to our crew. One redemption per customer. T&Cs apply.

comments.message: Ordered a spicy tortilla with angus beef and look what I got. Exactly 4 minuscule pieces of chips, shriveled lettuce, 'angus' beef that doesn't taste any different from the usual patty, and soggy tomatoes. McDonald's really need to step up their game. Feels like they've been putting in a lot more effort in their marketing over the actual food taste and presentation.

Thick juicy meat patties with REAL BACON. THATS A GREAT BURGER. SO PLEASE..... STFU..
No real bacon, pathetic "burgers", etc... I'd go for Carl's Junior anytime if I want a quick meal...
Recently, you guys came up with create a burger, so I created one as close to a Carl's Junior. 
I don't really know what to say but the price is almost the same, but you don't even come close to Carl's Junior 's junior's junior.....  
Guess you guys been clowning around all these years....
Even Ramli burgers beat you hands down...

hey i would like to ask about the spicyness level of the new "Spicy Chicken with Apple Slaw" Burger. i cannot eat McSpicy level of spicyness. My max is about the spicyness level of KFC's Zinger burger. 

Can anyone rate the new Spicy chicken burger's spicyness level based on the mcspicy/zinger burger's levels? Thanks alot!!
Funny how many people like to hit the LIKE button on Mcdonald's page and then comment on how bad Mcdonald's meals are! Such an irony still exist even after the 21st century

Dear McDonald's Singapore, I ordered the classic version of your Angus Beef Burger and paid 11 bucks for it, quite expensive to be honest. Worst, I came home expecting the Classic Angus Beef Burger but was given a Fillet O' Fish instead. I'm quite disappointed as I not only paid for something that I didn't get, also, I got something that I could have bought at almost 1/3 the price. 😐😑
Dear Mcdonald's Singapore why have your burgers shrunk in size? And patties really thin too? Used to be awesome & something to look forward to after a long day's work...

As usual, the only thing worth eating is mcspicy. Its the only decent thing i find in mc donalds. The rest of the items are overpriced or not tasty to me imho. This new angus beef burger sounds pleasing, but not on the price for a burger with 99% mince beef and 1% angus beef i suppose?
McDonald's Bugis Junction Hi. Ya, i ordered a takeaway of the spicy tortilla burger, is it I must request for meat separately?  Rakesh Mammen Jacq Lee Missy Lee
Personally I would still prefer the oldies like McSpicy, Big Mac, Fillet O Fish etc... The latest launches are seriously not worth it...
Hi McDonald's, I ordered the spicy chicken with apple slaw from the marine cove outlet, and much to my disappointment, the amount of apple slaw was nothing like that shown in the advertisement.
For those that have eaten at Macdonalds in Australia or USA, you would realized that McD Singapore has short changed us. 20 yrs ago McD really taste like the USA n Aussie Macs

Lmao guac is overrated. It's time to stop. Such a simple comfort Mexican food sold for so much money is just 🙅 Especially the salted Egg burger, tasted like flour and salt :( STOP MAKING COMFORT FOOD INTO CRAZY THINGS MACCAS 😕

I have a hunch that somewhere in Singapore, there is a Singaporean shop that can make a great burger. I used to get a great burger in Yishun, and it was $6. Why pay McDonald's $10+ for what appears to be a gamble? So sad... Please just buy local folks!

Just had your Classic cheese angus beef. I thought the taste was really pathetic and I paid $9 for this. The relish was overpowering the taste of the entire burger. I couldn't taste your premium beef at all.

Even the KFC umakara burger tastes much better than this overpriced garbage. Really standards dropping so much that they still dare to gouge customers taking for granted. Triple O and Carl's Jr already beaten you to quality of burgers for a long long time..

Doesn't matter if the ingredients are getting more attas or not. It's just a childish angle of marketing. Chances are you are still eating meat from cattle and poultry that have been bred by mega-scaled farms overseas (likely the US and Brazil) using highly environmentally-damaging means and poor breeding conditions, which in turn damages our health.

Ordered mcdelivery of spicy chicken apple stew with special request of extra apple stew and caramelised onion it came without extra apple stew nor onion. And worst without rocket. I paid for all the extra! This is ridiculous.

I prefer the Create-Your-Taste burgers for the beef ones, as the "atas" beef burgers combinations aren't even great and somehow the patties are drier and the burgers have much less sauce than if I made the Create Your Taste burger on the spot. The guacamole sauces also not enough. 

I always just custom order double patties, double guacamole sauce and add red onions and caramelized onions and rocket leaves. Just for like $3 more, i can get double patties, rocket leaves, onions, double guacamole, double cheese, etc+++

However, only the Spicy Chicken with Apple Slaw is nice, with the rocket leaves and crunchy apples; very new and exciting taste. Totally underrated.
I ordered apple slaw yesterday. Best chicken spicy burger i tasted to date. Today I'm trying the tortilla burger.

McDonalds need to take all this comment seriously for once and stop thinking that they will last very long in this business. I buy at least 3 times a week the junior coke and medium fries as i am going for my dialysis but what i get is cold fries to go along with three quarter cup of coke, they can't even fill it to the top....this happens at bedok reservoir branch....very disappointed.

McDonald's is a fast food restaurant but in order to make money they have to create items that sounds so classy. You guys shouldn't fall for it, if you really want a nice piece of steak, go and have a proper steak. The patties are so thin I rather just eat paper. All in all, don't expect too much guys 🙌
new classic cheese burger is too salty. Dine in at Toa Payoh Central on 11 Aug. Fries was hard and cold.

Quality ingredients do not correlate to quality taste. I've tasted the Classic Cheese with Angus Beef Burger, and it didn't taste cohesive. The Angus Beef patty wasn't that thick to begin with, and the taste and presentation just doesn't match the price. I'd rather have a tastier burger that uses cheap ingredients, than one stockpiled with angus beef, Colby cheese, guacamole...

Oh McDonald's, did you guys just replace the entire Create Your Taste business model with this? I've been waiting to treat myself to an "Ultimate" Burger with Double Angus Patty and all the Premiums Toppings after AHM.

Based on how previous island wide pseudo-CYT offerings like the Beef & Mushroom Deluxe turned out, I'll never get the same quality as the true "atasness" of a Create Your Taste Burger. You've lost a fan in me...
Morning, disappointed. Arrived in the office to find the whipped margarine and syrup missing from my Breakfast supreme... what am i supposed to have the hotcakes with...

comments.message: Honestly, i dont like the new set up at East Coast. Was there twice since it opened... The noise level is just crazy! And the call number system is just not effective that they still need their staff to shout at their top of their voices calling out the numbers. And there is no system for people to collect their food.. All are standing near to the counters and essentially blocking the pathway for people getting in and out of the restaurant. Have not been a very pleasant experience for me. Still very much like what it used to be and missing the drive-thru.
29 yrs ago I was attached for a while. Good memories esp got to 'play around' with the intercom for the drive through 😊

Absurd to see people queuing up to buy junk to eat. Responsible parents will not feed their children with heavily-processed chemical trash like these. 

Dear fellow Singaporeans, we have a rich local food culture and do not need to stoop so low ill-treating our bodies this way.

We were all dissapointed with the new setup of this mcdonalds. Imagine ordering just a drink and a mcflurry and waited for almost an hour for my number to be called where only my drink was ready and i had to wait for my mcflurry. I got frustrated and approached the counter again and was told they were out of what I wanted and gave me something else.. worst experience ever. Never coming back to that chaotic messy disorganised place that was once my fav hangout

It's typical advertising and brainwashing for people to think they will take their kids to the place since they were going since young and it will keep going. Mac is just plain junk food and KFC does this same thing as well. Generational sublime selling to the masses by using ordinary people. PAP uses the same method year on year

I think it is too chaotic on weekends. I got my order wrongly given 2 times. The shouting of numbers did not help either. Perhaps the management can look into it by using tv screening for queue numbers.

If you guys really want people to reminisce the ECP McDonald's, you guys shouldn't tear it down and rebuild it to a completely new architecture. Even if you need to upgrade, there is no necessity to tear down the place. This new McDonald's doesn't make me feel very reminiscing at all. It is like a completely new place to me. I felt such disappointment the moment I walked in...

P.S. There is no drive-thru either...
Waiting for stupid chocolate ice-cream cone for 15mins.. Lousy system.. 👎 Usually purchase at mall waiting time is less then 5mins.. 😏
Yeah they should at least have a ball pit to contain and keep us entertained while we waited for our number to be called.
I went there one evening after a drive. It was closed as it was past 11pm. Why is it  not 24 hrs?
Very honestly I had more memories at the King Albert Park branch :/
